website_summaries.verdict: A solid hard-sided option that can provide a safe storage space for your crossbow.
pros: Provides a solid and tight fit
Velcro straps help hold your crossbow in place
Room under the bow for a detachable quiver
cons: Does not come with a lot of padding
You may want to add extra to get a custom fit

customer_reviews.title: NIce Case
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. Fits my Centerpoint Sniper 370 perfectly with buttstock fully extended and scope on. Extra room in hollow spots for rope cooker, bolts in bottom and other smaller gear. Needs more foam for custom fit but very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ray S.

customer_reviews.title: Centerpoint sniper 370 fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This case is well worth the money you can't go wrong with Plano. I have the centerpoint sniper 370 and it fits inside this case perfectly with the scope on the quiver won't while it is attached but I will if you take it off and lay on top of the extra piece of foam that comes with the case. There is a little room if you want to add a small pouch for your rail lube, string wax, cocking rope etc. we also tired my son's Barnett Quad Edge S and it fits also with plenty of room since it is shorter than the sniper 370. Well worth buying and a heck of a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Robin Hood be like whaaaaaaat?
customer_reviews.text: This case is SOLID. My Barnett Ghost 415 fits perfectly. The ONLY downside is lack of padding. I read up on the reviews, so I simply ordered some inexpensive foam and BAM! The BMW of crossbow cases. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for Crossman Sniper
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved plano hard plastic bow cases. This one is no different. I waited for months to find one in my price catagorie. $57 day after Christmas sale, so I jumped at it. Other reviews comment on need for more foam and I agree it could use some. It was back-ordered but came faster than anticipated.My old case filled in for my crossman sniper. till now.Fits great, excellent protection, In my mid sixties this will be my final archery big purchase and I'm happy as hell!
customer_reviews.author: normy

customer_reviews.title: Fit my Carbon Express Pile Driver just fine. I had to remove my quiver to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Carbon Express Pile Driver just fine. I had to remove my quiver to get it to fit. I was able to place the quiver next to the bow in a secure location.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Verley

customer_reviews.title: Great Case for Killer Instinct Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of those big, bulky hard cases for those older style crossbows. Also not too happy with the protection a soft case affords. Hence, I took a chance on this case to use with my Killer Instinct Furious 370 crossbow. It was exactly what I hoped for. It was compact, yet roomy enough for the more modern crossbows like the one I have. I did get a few more pieces of closed cell foam and used double sided tape to add a bit more padding. I do think this is the only negative about this case, and one Plano should consider in future designs.
customer_reviews.author: Longbow

customer_reviews.title: Great Case missing 1 Latch out of the 3
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. Fits my CenterPiont sniper 370 very well even after attaching a AR15 foregrip on it. I add extra foam as others have suggested. I don't think it would be worth it to send it back for one missing Latch, I did check the packaging. Which wasn't hard there was no padding around it at all. so nothing & no holes in the packaging big enough to have the latch fall out. Going to see if I can get a replacement Latch from Plano. Plano is sending me a Latch after talking to them on the phone. Should be here in a week. Thanks Plano😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid value.  Made in US.  Without question the best case for an Excalibur Micro.
customer_reviews.text: Made in US. Solid construction. Excellent value. Not much in the way of storage, but I attached my bolt case to the top of this crossbow case with a few stainless steel bolts and washers from the hardware store and it works well. One thing that makes me very happy with this purchase: my Excalibur Micro Mag 340 fits perfectly in this case, as though it was custom made for it. There is only about a half inch to spare from each limb tip on either side. The Tact 100 scope is solidly protected under a shell of plastic. Just terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Silas Pitch

customer_reviews.title: Great case for Ghost 360 crossbow protection.
customer_reviews.text: Great case for my Barnett Ghost 360 crossbow. Don't have to be as careful with this crossbow case as you would with a soft case. Just two straps hold the crossbow securely in the 2 foam pads supplied. There are extra straps but I felt I didn't need to use them. I keep my cocking rope, rail lube and quiver with three bolts inside. I do wrap the quiver in a bath towel to protect the bow and the bolts from hitting each other.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: A must to protect high end crossbows
customer_reviews.text: It was missing a strap when it arrived but I happened to have some spare velcro straps so I didn't bother sending it back. It did include an extra foam pad so I use that to separate the crossbow from the quiver. FYI, used with a Centerpoint 370 Sniper crossbow. Given how loaded the car gets when hauling hunting gear, I really like having a hard sided case rather than a soft case and this one works well. If it was priced in the same range as a hard shell bow case I'd give it more stars. Very functional, just not the best value given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Deer HunterTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A Great Case!
customer_reviews.text: Barnett Assault 350 fits perfectly with Scope mounted and flashlight on lower rail. Quiver fits nicely alongside. I've seen where others complained about lack of extra feel good foam, the included is more than enough. You could add more but it's a fools errand. With just one forward and one rear strap the bow has zero movement in the case and contacts the plastic nowhere. Order and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna & George

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be a little better quality.
customer_reviews.text: It does not hold your crossbow securely. Plan on having some foam to secure it. The handle does not close properly. Its warped in manufacturing.I thought it would be a little better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money nice case
customer_reviews.text: Fits my wicked ridge warrior no problem. I dont know why there are negative reviews. This is a great all around case for the money. If you wanted something bomb proof you would be spending way more money. It comes with two pieces of foam i put on on top and one on bottom where scope sits and the straps are plenty secure keeps crossbow plenty secure.
customer_reviews.author: Cooter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Case for Tenpoint Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect for my Tenpoint Turbo XT Crossbow. It fits great and the case comes with two nice foam pads and several straps for strapping the crossbow down securely. The price was great and I am very pleased with this hard case as it will protect my investment in the cross bow for years to come and that is important to me. From what I see so far this is a great buy and I just have to hunt down a sling for carrying the whole package for any kind of distance.
customer_reviews.author: ConservativeFan

customer_reviews.title: Ten Point Ultra GT with accudraw
customer_reviews.text: bow fits well room for quiver but i haven't tried to fit any bolts in there, it doesn't appear to have adequate space without messing up the vanes. will likely purchase a bolt case so don't have to worry about them. its a cheap case but for money bow fits nice and stable, shuts well. happy with purchase and will protect my investment well. i read you can use for air travel but that won't apply to me.
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Chicken

customer_reviews.title: HARD CASE IS PERFECT---BUT NO INSIDE PADDING!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: COME ON PLANO GUYS YOU BUILD A PRETTY NICE PRICEABLE CROSSBOW HARD CASE WITH VERY LIMITED PADDING INSIDE. YOU CAN'T CARRY AROUND A $600-$1000 CROSSBOW AROUND WITHOUT IT SLIDING BACK AND FORTH, UP AND DOWN. NO INSIDE UPPER BOW PROTECTION FOR BOW OR SCOPE EXCEPT OUTSIDE SHELL. YOU COULD PAD THE WHOLE CASE EASY FOR AN EXTRA $1.298 AND HAVE THE BEST CROSSBOW HARD CASE ON THE MARKET FOR A REASONABLE PRICE. COME ON PLANO YOUR BETTER THAN THAT.
customer_reviews.author: JOE

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Crossbow perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I own a Barnett Predator Crossbow and this fits and protects it perfectly. It comes with two foam pads but I bought additional padding on ebay to further secure it. The case also has some tie-downs that you can use to further secure your crossbow. I wish I had purchased it prior to buying a soft case.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I purchased this for my new centerpoint sniper 370 and fits perfect with extra room for accessories. It was missing several straps but not that big of a deal. And very surprised by how light it is. It was shipped in a 4foot tall x 2.5 ft wide box and expected it to be heavy but it feels lighter than a rifle case. Locks are great and the case also has to locking points which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Will S

customer_reviews.title: Well made and Made in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have absolutely no complaints. The case is very well made as well as made in the USA which is of great importance to me personally. It fits my new Barnett Whitetail Hunter STR Crossbow, along with ample storage under the crossbow for my Barnett Headhunter- 22" Crossbow Bolts.
customer_reviews.author: David Thrift

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to hold and protect my Barnett Whitetail Hunter STR. Seems like a decent case for the money. Holds the crossbow securely with the included Velcro straps. We’ll see how it holds up. I do like the way it sits up on its side to save space.
customer_reviews.author: Scott N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Fit the Barnett Raptor FX3 Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend. His Barnett Raptor FX3 fit perfectly! Only thing was the box was beat up pretty bad, but the case was perfect. Thanks for the great price and great item.
customer_reviews.author: Joy M

customer_reviews.title: Ideal case,  Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money you pay. Fits my TenPoint Titan M1 just fine. No room for the crossbow to move around while handling. Depending on how your quiver mounts you may have a little trouble getting your quiver in without detaching it from the bow, which shouldn't be much of a problem. No regrets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice case. I have a Center Point Tormentor
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. I have a Center Point Tormentor. Fits great... only downside is I can't figure how to get the quiver in the case - attached or unattached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protection for my Cross Box!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product that gives you the overall satisfaction of protecting your crossbows regardless of travel. On an ATV, vehicle, or just carrying it around. Extremely lightweight and the best protection around. 5 Stars for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Eichholz

customer_reviews.title: Seems solid so far and protects my CBow
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Barnett ghost 375 well. Looks and feels solid. time will tell if it'll hold up. Plano makes some good fishing tackle boxes but their durability over the long run can be questionable. So.......
customer_reviews.author: Tom I

customer_reviews.title: Excellent crossbow case
customer_reviews.text: Excellent crossbow case and perfect for my Centerpoint Gladiator 405 Crossbow. The quiver is hidden under foam and does not affect the position or balance of the crossbow bow in the case
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Very good protection!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Barnett Penetrator fits snuggly inside, just wish the bolt quiver had an area it could fit in with it without compromising protection of the bolts or the crossbow. But very sturdy case and protection!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bigg Robb

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Best crossbow case I could find. Holds a Barnett Raptor FX 3 Pro perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Fits Barnett Ghost 350
customer_reviews.text: Great low cost hard case. Fits my Barnett Ghost 350 Crossbow with scope 'really' well. I cut a couple of slits in the forward foam padding for the tie down straps to go thru and it is really secure. Not any pouches spots to put extra gear inside, but I was able to get my 3 bolt quiver w/bolts, several extra bolts and a Zip-Loc bag of small extras inside. I think it will work out great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cross bow fits nicely but it was suppose to come with 6 tie ...
customer_reviews.text: My cross bow fits nicely but it was suppose to come with 6 tie straps of 3 different sizes. It was missing the 2- 8 inch straps and of course these were the ones that would have held my bow most securely in the case. Kinda of disappointed in that but other than the missing straps it should keep the bow protected.
customer_reviews.author: dburk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit. Added some foam inserts and now fits ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a case for my Mission Dagger for a year. Awesome fit. Added some foam inserts and now fits perfect. Mission sent me decals and now looks like a custom case.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Best in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Bought this is for my newer xbow (pictured). This is my second spire case, bought the first one from the store maybe 2 years ago. In my opinion, its the best case out there. The first one I have thrown around in a back of a truck, got it pretty scratched up, and it protected my xbow beautifully. Also holds a 3 flight quiver perfectly along with my saddle bag. They're a little bulky, but I only care about the protection. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M.

customer_reviews.title: Cant complain
customer_reviews.text: Arrived crazy fast. It fits my bear x saga 370 pretty well along with the quiver and 4 bolts. Because my bow is on the smaller side I was able to fit my tools and extra broad heads in the case. Could use a little more padding but luckily I had some left over from another project. Overall I'm very happy with my purchase and would definitely recommend this case
customer_reviews.author: Lance Uppercut

customer_reviews.title: Solid Case!
customer_reviews.text: Solid case fits my Ten Point Turbo GT with plenty of space for the quiver, spare bolts and accessories. The provided foam seems more than adequate to protect the bow for storage and travel in my truck, but you could always add a little extra if you were checking it on a flight for a hunting trip. Great case!
customer_reviews.author: K. G

customer_reviews.title: It's a big deal!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely done. Beautiful case. Extra room for cocking rope or mechanical cocking device. It's the best $54 i've ever spent
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Durable can take a beating but does great job protecting the bow. Closure mechanism works with ease. Extremely fast shipping as well!
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case fits my pse fang XT perfectly I would recommend getting this case if you want to keep your crossbow safe from damaged during transit
customer_reviews.author: William Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Fits Barnett Droptine perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a hard case that's not over sized but fits perfectly with the Barnett Droptine crossbow. Padding was adequate but purchased some black hard foam pipe insulation and velcor from Home Depot and added it in a few spots. Easy to carry, load and unload.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Rymarz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my crossbow.
customer_reviews.text: Great crossbow case. Comes with 3 straps. And 2 large pieces of foam. My 10 point stealth does not move at all in this case.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Your cross bow will not fit after cocked.
customer_reviews.text: It will give enough protection to your cross bow, what I do not like is you have to release your crossbow after cocked, otherwise will not fit, I have to take a portable target with me when I am out to hunt.
customer_reviews.author: Jiarong Shi

customer_reviews.title: Clip broke off w/in 1 week.
customer_reviews.text: Good for protecting & transporting my crossbow, but 1 of the 3 clips to close it broke off right away and I lost it :-/
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Universal Hard Crossbow Case
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it holds my crossbow perfect. A little pricey but much cheaper then some of the name brand hard cases.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking case. Fit my Barnett whitetail pro str. PERFECTLY. Bought at right time. Saved 30 bucks. Might have hesitated at $90..00 but still awesome looking and functional.
customer_reviews.author: woodman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fit for Barnett Ghost 360
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Fit for Barnett Ghost 360. Purchased a soft case with the crossbow and found it to be of no value either with protection and no storage. The Plano Hardcase works great. I did purchase a couple of pieces of foam to provide some additional packing around the scope.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny L

customer_reviews.title: Buy it and enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Wicked Ridge Invader G3 crossbow and this case fits it perfectly. The length and width match it so close that I feel it was made for it! Buy it and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W Theis

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the case it is huge but it does as it is described. Would diffidently recommend to anyone buying a crossbow.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It's a tank very protective
customer_reviews.text: Very bulky but nothing will harm my crossbow while it's in there latches have been great with no problens at all. Only con is no place for bolt storage
customer_reviews.author: Rodney S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This case fits my Barnett white tail hunter 2 perfect, even with my bipod installed. Will buy again for my second crossbow. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason f

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: my bow fits nicely in but not securely. the Interior lashing straps to hold crossbow in place is missing.
customer_reviews.author: S.harper

customer_reviews.title: A little tight (short) for my Barnett Predator, so ...
customer_reviews.text: A little tight (short) for my Barnett Predator, so I had to take the rubber pad off the front of the crossbow just to get it closed. Real tight, but adequate
customer_reviews.author: Alan L. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: this is a great case fits my wicked ridge invader perfect expect to ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great case fits my wicked ridge invader perfect expect to get many years of use out of it best bang for your buck if your bow fits in it you cant go wrong maybe ad padding in case it comes loose from Velcro other wise its perfect its better than i expected for the price
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN F.

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: Superior to cloth crossbow cases. Durable and sturdy at a good price. My Excalibur crossbow fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Hempel

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case
customer_reviews.text: I have an old on that opens at the front very hard to do in the field takes up to much room. This new case is awesome and stronger plus takes less room to open
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Centerpoint Sniper 370
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my xbow. I did buy some soundproofing foam to fill in the space around the bow. Must remove my quiver from the bow mount but it still fits in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Deuce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for the traveling hunter who hates soft cases.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a case guy, everything needs a case and this fit the bill for my crossbow. It won't hold your mtm bolt case but I didn't care, my quiver fits perfect under the bow and holds everything I need. Holds Sniper 370 perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Modifications Needed
customer_reviews.text: Will not work for a Excalibur Micro Suppressor without minor modifications to where the scope and the case meet when closed. Also have to put the quiver next to the crossbow instead of under it like specified in the instructions to close case. Other than that it seems to be just the same as any other Plano case I’ve ever bought. Will do the job without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: We'll built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We'll built and sturdy crossbow case holds crossbow and extra equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Alan T.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Very good protection for my Centerpoint Tormentor Whisper. Plenty of room for scope, and can store the quiver securely underneath.
customer_reviews.author: dwdw3

customer_reviews.title: Case is too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought the case for my Parker Center Fire Xtreme and the case is too small. I have an older Parker Bushwacker that barely fits. I’m keeping the case for my older bow and will for another case for my new bow
customer_reviews.author: G G

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: This case worked perfect for my crossbow. I had to have it shipped. I normally just use a soft case. It held everything really well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Knibbs

customer_reviews.title: Maybe fits most, not all.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this case, it seems well made, but it did not fit my SA sports empire aggressor 390 with vertical foregrip.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Salminen

customer_reviews.title: They fit Sniper 370s no problems.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for Sniper 370s. They worked just fine. Had room for everything including tools and lube products. They close up just fine with scope mounted, but must remove Quiver and place it in bottom as instructions suggest. No problems then getting everything inside and closed up. I would recommend them for the CenterPoint Sniper 370 crossbow no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Ergot

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for your crossbow
customer_reviews.text: My crossbow fixing it real well very secure worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect it fits my barnett brotherhood with scope attached. It also has plenty of padding for protection and straps. I had the flambeau stingray, but it would not fit with scope attached. Which means everytime i wanted to use it i would have to reattach it and sight it in.
customer_reviews.author: Thebluewaterline

customer_reviews.title: Good case. Big size.
customer_reviews.text: Good case. Sized as expected I really think that you need to match your crossbow to case size. This is a good case but you may want to add your own padding.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Troy

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed it fits my Barnett Recruit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable crossbow case.
customer_reviews.text: My Mission sub1 XR crossbow fit into this case quite nicely and offers substantially more protection.
customer_reviews.author: offthewall

customer_reviews.title: You build them they will buy them!!
customer_reviews.text: Got lost in shipping som place in Syracuse ny .really needed it. Not your fault. Your product line is by far 100 percent quality an the durability top of the line. Soon as i receive my refund I will have my crossbow case in hand. Keep making your quality products . You make them they're going to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: bill blaney

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hunt an xbow without one
customer_reviews.text: Unreal ALIEN looking shell that thought of everything you need to keep your xbow safe
customer_reviews.author: Monique Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for new crossbow. Fits good. Holds bow, arrows, and all pieces comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: fred hill

customer_reviews.title: A great crossbow case
customer_reviews.text: I love this hard case for my crossbow so much better than that soft case easy to open and get into and it secures my crossbow
customer_reviews.author: Slewis

customer_reviews.title: but for the price for a hard case I like it. I think it will give the protection ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Centerpoint Sniper 370 really well. Could use some more padding and I cannot keep the arrow quiver on the xbow, but for the price for a hard case I like it. I think it will give the protection I am looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Give us more details about products.
customer_reviews.text: Needed more details on size.. Very good quality built. But not the size needed.
customer_reviews.author: Milford Schofield

customer_reviews.title: Great case.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case for my sniper 370. Everything fits. Thank for the fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Plano Spire Crossbow Case
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy and the Cross Bow fits in the case nicely
customer_reviews.author: Lazlinda

customer_reviews.title: Tough plastic with no storade for accessories
customer_reviews.text: cannot store my bow with the quiver mounted or rested inside. I wish there was at least one pocket in the corner for storage of accessories. but it does its job of protecting my bow while I travel and meets the requirement for legal transportation in my state.
customer_reviews.author: kyle purington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a 370 sniper center point crossbow. I can fit everything that I need in it. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Regeon

customer_reviews.title: Hard case is the best way to go and this one is nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I got the case, it is light, fits the bow JUST perfect, and room for arrows and quiver! This has 3 nice snap locks and am so happy my hubby loved his birthday present!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: This product is Quality bow case for my new crossbow.....
customer_reviews.author: bgtexas

customer_reviews.title: Great case, fits Barnett d
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Had a soft case for one of my kids’ crossbows and the red dot got bumped in the back of the truck when the load shifted. This case has been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane

customer_reviews.title: U wont
customer_reviews.text: No where near the quailty of old Plano. Made in China u ruined your name with me
customer_reviews.author: John a.

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: I like it but needs space for bolts. & Could be done without making it bigger. Just tweaked a little. Overall great case
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Solid hard case that fit the crossbow perfectly!! Protection but not horribly heavy!!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: would like to see prices stay the same not double on products
customer_reviews.text: the frist one i purchased was priced as i expected second one was way more expensive almost double what i pay for the frist one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works with TenPoint Turbo GT
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2017 Tenpoint Turbo GT very nicely. I did add an extra piece of foam inside for a little more added padding. Easy to carry and seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dale I. T

customer_reviews.title: fits crosbow nicely
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my sniper 370 and not disappointed plenty of room for bow , arrows, and a few accessories
customer_reviews.author: Nurseronda

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Wicked Ridge G3 perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this elsewhere due to shipping issues but I wanted to leave the review on Amazon. High quality case for my Wicked Ridge Invader G3.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very good and durable
customer_reviews.text: Center Point Specialist XL 370 fit perfectly with upgraded scope. Since the quiver is inline, I did not have to remove it. Only cross mount quiver will need to be removed. Very good and durable.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy Happy
customer_reviews.text: It's big, but if I put a lot of money into my crossbow, I want it protected. This case does the job.
customer_reviews.author: preacher_man_d

customer_reviews.title: Fit my Barnett
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case. Fit my Barnett very well. 4 star only cause I was looking for a tighter seal.
customer_reviews.author: BeonNeon

customer_reviews.title: Missing hinge pins
customer_reviews.text: The case seems like it would be a great case but the hinge pins are missing on mine. This pretty much makes the case useless as the lid does not stay on with the hinge pins missing. Other then not being able to use it it seems like a great case and comes with foam inserts to cushion your bow inside.
customer_reviews.author: adamcshay

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Fit my daughters Centerpoint good without the arrows. Comes with minimum padding but overall a good case.
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh D.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case
customer_reviews.text: Safely keeps the cross bow. I do have to remove my quiver and adjust it. Would like to have some bolt/arrow snap ins somewhere. Very sturdy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: I ordered mine from the amazon warehouse open box deals and it arrived with new tags still attached and case was in perfect condition and it was half the cost of a ...
customer_reviews.text: My Tenpoint Lady Shadow crossbow fits in this case perfectly. There is room under the bow for the detatchable quiver and room for a few extra items such as bow and rail lube and possibly a broadhead case. I ordered mine from the amazon warehouse open box deals and it arrived with new tags still attached and case was in perfect condition and it was half the cost of a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love the case
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this case! I have a kronicle crossbow that fits great! Don't think I could have found a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Joelrandle53

customer_reviews.title: would be nice if it had longer straps and if they made it bigger so it could hold my quiver
customer_reviews.text: Nice case for the price. It would be nice if it had longer velcrow straps to hold my crossbow. It would also be nice if they made it a little bigger so it could hold my 3 arrows quiver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Crossbow fit the case great. Super protected and easy to take the crossbow in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Ron E

customer_reviews.title: Great bow case
customer_reviews.text: Nice bow case for the money, strong and protects bow nicely
customer_reviews.author: Doug Witt

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Built very well had to return too small for my crossbow.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I would’ve given it a higher rating but 2 of the locking tabs came broke. Outside of that it does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Franchise

product_meta.title: Plano Spire Crossbow Case, Black, Packs
product_meta.description: Perfect fit means perfect protection. And it looks pretty slick, too. Introducing Plano's new SPIRE Crossbow Case. With a new dynamic design combined with the dependable craftsmanship that you expect from a Plano hard case, the SPIRE Crossbow Case is sure to impress. It provides excellent protection, high-density foam padding, balanced carry handles, quiver storage and easily fits all major crossbow brands.
feature_bullets: PLANO CROSSBOW CASES; Protecting your passion since 1952

Compact size fits most modern crossbow models, Three heavy duty latches for secure closure, Balanced carry handles, Stands on side for easy storage, Padlock clasps, Quiver storage in base (fits most quivers). Foam Type : Flat
DIMENSIONS; Outside Dimensions: 41.22 inches L x 12.25 inches W x 11 H. Interior Dimensions - 39 L x 27 W x 12 H inches

FEATURES: Perfect fit means perfect protection. And it looks pretty slick, too. The SPIRE Crossbow Case is sure to impress with a dynamic design combined with the dependable craftsmanship that you expect from a Plano hard case
